meanings.definition: Personalisms: Beliefs or characteristics that are unique to an individual.
meanings.sent1: Her personalisms, like always wearing mismatched socks, made her stand out.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the personalisms of each artist in this gallery.
meanings.sent3: His personalisms are so quirky that he even named his plants.
meanings.sent4: The personalisms of the town were evident in the colorful murals on every street corner.
meanings.sent5: The personalisms of the chef shone through in every dish he created.

meanings.definition: Personalisms: The act of expressing one's individuality or opinions in a personal manner.
meanings.sent1: Through her personalisms, she always made sure her voice was heard.
meanings.sent2: The personalisms of the students were encouraged in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: His personalisms were so strong that he even personalized his car's license plate.
meanings.sent4: The personalisms of the team were the key to their success.
meanings.sent5: The personalisms of the author were evident in every page of the book.
